Title: Relates to the visitation rights of great-grandparents
Summary: Provides that a great-grandparent may apply to the supreme court for visitation rights with respect to certain minor great-grandchildren where either or both of the parents of such child is or are deceased.
LawCode: Amd ยง72, Dom Rel L; amd ยง651, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law and the family court act, in relation to the visitation rights of great-grandparents
